5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

<pointer-exit-event>

Sealed instantiable class

Summary

The class of events that describe a pointer leaving an area such as a sheet.

Superclasses

<pointer-boundary-event>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

The class of events that describe a pointer leaving an area such as a sheet.

Operations

None.

See also

<pointer-button-event>, page 321

<pointer-enter-event>, page 325

<pointer-motion-event>, page 327

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
